revised_title: Production of a Specific Gastrotoxic Serum: Preliminary Communication
tldr: The author investigates the production of a specific gastrotoxic serum and its effects on the stomach. By injecting stomach cells from guinea pigs and rabbits into other animals, the author observes symptoms, changes in blood, and lesions in the stomachs. This research aims to contribute to the understanding of cytotoxic action and the pathology of human gastric ulcers.
